creator: emil.ghitta@softvision.ro
summary: [VirtualizedTree] Several elements are not displayed after vertically resizing the "Properties" panel

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text:
Created attachment 8981913
Resize.gif

[Affected versions]:
Firefox 62.0a1 (BuildId:20180529220039).
Firefox 61.0b9 (BuildId:20180528091514).

[Affected platforms]:
Windows 10 64bit.
macOS 10.12.
Ubuntu 16.04 64bit.

[Steps to reproduce]:
1. Launch Firefox.
2. Access any website.
3. Enable the Accessibility features.
4. Expand several elements from the "Properties" panel.
5. Dock the "Developer Tools" panel to side.
6. Vertical drag the "Properties" panel in order to display all the available information.

[Expected result]:
The panel displays all the elements successfully.

[Actual result]:
Some elements are not displayed inside the "Properties" panel. 

[Regression range]:
I don't think that this is a regression.

[Additional information]:
For further information regarding this issue please observe the attached screencast.
comments.author: emil.ghitta@softvision.ro
